text:
Flickr | Senior Backend Engineer | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE | https://www.flickr.com/

Do you look at an app and try to figure out its database schema? Do you wish every website provided a full API? Do you worry about cache invalidation and naming things? Flickr is looking for experienced backend software engineer to help deliver an awesome experience to our customers.

Click here for more info: https://jobs.smugmug.com/Job-Openings?1428744?gh_jid=1428744
